original_title: AG to file contempt charges against ex-SDIG Nilantha Jayawardana
original_body_lines: The Attorney General today informed the Supreme Court that contempt of court charges will be filed against former Senior DIG and head of the State Intelligence Service (SIS), Nilantha Jayawardana, for failing to pay the Rs. 75 million in compensation for the Easter Sunday bomb victims as ordered by the court.
Accordingly, the Supreme Court has ordered him to appear before the court on October 07.
